title: Rune Page Problems.... Anyone else??
body:
Hi,

I'm pretty sure my problems only happened after the patch, but...

I have three rune pages: AD, JG2 (was Support), and Jungle. Everything was fine with the three pages until I went to modify the Jungle page. It let me clear the page but now it won't let me save anything to it. I was able to modify the Support page and changed the name to JG2 so I wouldn't get confused. I was able to modify runes and save that page. Or so I thought...

When I went into the champ selection page, the rune choices I had were AD, Jungle, Jungle. If I tried to select either of the Jungle, it would just revert to the AD selection. (I'm guessing because the Jungle page is actually empty.) I don't see the JG2 page at all. When I try to modify Jungle, it now changes the page name to JG2, on it's own.

Everything was working fine before the latest patch. Perhaps just a coincidence. 

I have submitted a ticket, but thought maybe someone else has had this happen and perhaps has an answer.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: We're looking into a few reports on these duplicate pages.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look as well as fix up your specific issue.  To help speed things up a bit, rename the impacted rune pages and let your specialist know what you've named them in your ticket.  We'll get back to you!
